cells.data:
1. From Google Groups announcement get links to all SDKs 
  2. Update index page /docs/en/video-cloud/mobile-sdks/brightcove-player-sdk-for-ios/index.html
    1. Must update each SDK individually (versions are different)
    2. To find Changelog (find in github then click View for path)
  3. Get source code for zip, GitHub: brightcove/brightcove-player-sdk-ios
    1. Download all sources zip files (number may vary on what has been updated)
  4. BCL-Content
    1. upload iOS SDK zip file and plugin files to ios-sdks folder
  5. BCL-developer-docs
    1. Add to versions folder (move html folder contents into version folder), and put SDK into reference/versions/(new folder)
      1. Copy latest SDK version into the reference/current folder.
    2. For each plugin, create new versions folder and add docs
      1. Copy latest plugin version into plugins/freewheel/reference/current folder
      2. Add a new plugin, if needed
    3. Edit iOS landing page: index.html
      1. In Download the SDK section, update the SDK version numbers
      2. In the Integrations section (plugins), Do Not update any version numbers. This is set up to automatically pull the most current version.
    4. Do the same for tvOS (no plugins)
      1. Add to versions folder (move html folder contents into version folder), and put SDK into reference/versions/(new folder)
        1. Copy latest SDK version into the reference/current folder.
      2. Edit tvOS landing page: index.html
        1. In Download the SDK section, update the SDK version numbers
  6. Edit grunt file (/git/BCL-developer-docs/en/grunt/source/mobile-sdsks.json). Change the SDK Reference URL to new version number and any other plugins that have been updated
    1. Open Terminal from for grunt folder
    2. If needed, Node > Duplicate Node
  7. Grunt to update the navigation
  8. Then push live. See Push Docs Live process note.
